meanings.definition: An area of land where oil is extracted.
meanings.sent1: The workers drilled for oil in the vast oilfields.
meanings.sent2: The oilfields in Texas are known for their rich reserves.
meanings.sent3: Why did the oilfields throw a party? They wanted to celebrate their gushing success!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an oilfield, full of hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The oilfields stretched out before us like a golden sea of opportunity.

meanings.definition: The industry or business of extracting oil from the ground.
meanings.sent1: Many people work in the oilfields to support their families.
meanings.sent2: The oilfields play a crucial role in the country's economy.
meanings.sent3: The oilfields decided to go on strike, demanding better working conditions.
meanings.sent4: In the competitive world of business, the oilfields were a lucrative investment.
meanings.sent5: The oilfields hummed with activity, a symphony of progress and prosperity.
